de.reelos.wordfilter.database

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.reelos.wordfilter.database.DAO

  • public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object for Connection to MySQL Database. I'm using a Singleton for this cause there shouldn't be more than one instance of this class.
    Author:
    Reelos

      • addWord

        public int addWord(java.lang.String playername,
          java.lang.String word,
          int flag)
        Adds a Specific Word to the Blacklist
        Parameters:
        playername - Name of the Player which added the SwearWord.
        word - The Word which should be added to the blacklist.
        flag - for if all or just some special snowflakes should be unable to use this word.
        Returns:
        either -1 if an error ocoures, 0 if nothing changed or 1 if the word was successfully added.

      • removeWord

        public int removeWord(java.lang.String word)
        Removes a Word from the blacklist table.
        Parameters:
        word - String that should be removed from blacklist table.
        Returns:
        either -1 on error, 0 on no change or 1 on success.

      • changeWordFlag

        public int changeWordFlag(java.lang.String word,
                 int flag)
        Set the Flag of a blacklisted word.
        Parameters:
        word - String of blacklisted word to set flag
        flag - int to set flag
        Returns:
        -1 on any error, 0 if word not found, 1 on success
